title.rendered: Maple Avenue Yearbooks are on Sale Now

content.rendered:
It’s time to order your 2025 Yearbook!

  • Sales are pre-order ONLY!
  • Click this link to order:   https://jostensyearbooks.com/?REF=A01005038 
  • The yearbooks are $15 and softcover

excerpt.rendered: It’s time to order your 2025 Yearbook! Sales are pre-order ONLY! Click this link to order:   https://jostensyearbooks.com/?REF=A01005038  The yearbooks are $15 and softcover
